question: During the time of Lord Cornwallis, the Sadar Diwani Adalat used to take cases more than which of the following amounts?
explanation: The Sadar Diwani Adalat used to take cases of the amount involved more than Rs. 1000. Generally, the verdict of Sadar Diwani Adalat was final. But n case the amount involved in the case is more than Rs. 5000, then the case could be taken to the King in-Council.
